MRN-5_syn_1:
Indication: ILD workup.
Proc: REBUS-guided Cryobiopsy RLL.
Details: Arndt blocker placed. REBUS confirmed no vessels. 5 samples taken.
Comp: None.
Disp: Home.
MRN-5_syn_2:
PROCEDURE: Transbronchial Cryobiopsy with Radial EBUS Guidance.
INDICATION: Interstitial Lung Disease diagnosis.
NARRATIVE: An Arndt bronchial blocker was positioned for prophylactic control. The RLL target area was screened with radial EBUS to ensure a vessel-free zone. Five cryobiopsies were obtained. The blocker was inflated after each pass to prevent bleeding. Hemostasis was excellent.
IMPRESSION: Adequate tissue for ILD classification.
MRN-5_syn_3:
Codes: 31628 (Lung biopsy), 31654 (REBUS).
Note: Cryobiopsy is coded as 31628. Blocker is incidental.
Samples: 5 from RLL.
Guidance: Radial EBUS used for safety.
MRN-5_syn_4:
Procedure: Cryobiopsy
Patient: [REDACTED]
Steps:
1. GA/ETT.
2. Blocker in RLL.
3. REBUS checked area.
4. Freeze biopsy x5.
5. Inflated blocker each time.
6. No bleeding.
Result: ILD tissue.
MRN-5_syn_5: doing a cryo for ild. put the blocker in first. used the radar probe to check for vessels. froze 5 pieces from the right lower lobe. no bleeding problems. hopefully pathology can figure it out.
MRN-5_syn_6: Bronchoscopy with REBUS-guided transbronchial cryobiopsy of the right lower lobe (5 samples) for ILD workup using an Arndt blocker for bleeding control. Procedure uneventful.
MRN-5_syn_7:
[Indication]
ILD diagnosis.
[Anesthesia]
General.
[Description]
REBUS guidance used. Arndt blocker placed. 5 cryobiopsies taken from RLL. Hemostasis secured.
[Plan]
Follow up ILD clinic.
MRN-5_syn_8: We performed a cryobiopsy to help diagnose the patient's interstitial lung disease. We placed a balloon blocker in the airway first for safety. Using radial ultrasound, we found a safe spot in the right lower lobe and took five large tissue samples using the freezing probe. There was no significant bleeding, and the patient recovered well.
MRN-5_syn_9:
Procedure: Cryo-adhesive parenchymal sampling.
Guidance: Radial ultrasonography.
Action: An endobronchial blocker was deployed. Five biopsy specimens were harvested from the RLL via cryoprobe.
Result: Diagnostic tissue acquisition.
